news.content:
ThreeFold Grid 2.3 is LIVE on mainnet!

The release introduces some improvements to the grid‚Äôs stability, new features, and testnet resource additions.

Read the TF Grid 2.3 official release note for more info.

Many thanks to the development team who made this release happen! üëè
news.excerpt: The release introduces some improvements to the grid‚Äôs stability, new features, and testnet resource additions. You can read more within!
